name: HookEscaper -High Speed 3D Action Game
description:
Grappling Hookguns: Ride around the aerial ruins!
.

HookEscaper is a high-speed 3D action racing game where you use a "grappling hook gun" to reach the finish line.

Find your own shortcuts in over 50 (planned) stages and aim for the fastest times! Don't worry, the possibilities with the Grappling Hook Gun are endless!


Gimmicks
Make the most of gimmicks!
Hook onto flying boulders and fly with them!
.


Hook the sky as you navigate through falling rocks!!!
.


Smash any gimmicks that get in your way!
.


You have to make your own way!
Even the things that seem to be in your way could help you!
